name: Space Dodge (Code Freak)
description:
Welcome to the future of game development!

In this revolutionary new game, every aspect of the game - from the art to the code - has been created by some of the most advanced artificial intelligence systems in the world, including ChatGPT, DALL-E-2, and Strofa.

Explore a rich and immersive world, filled with stunning visuals and breathtaking landscapes, all generated by the incredible DALL-E-2 system. Encounter unique and challenging enemies, each with their own behaviors and abilities, designed by the intelligent and adaptable Strofa AI.

Experience innovative gameplay mechanics, each created with the help of the powerful and knowledgeable ChatGPT system. Solve puzzles, uncover secrets, and battle bosses, all while immersing yourself in a world unlike any other.

This game is a testament to the incredible power of artificial intelligence, and represents a new era of game development. So what are you waiting for? Dive into a world created entirely by AI, and experience a game like no other.

P.S. by Code Freak: Yes, AI made this description.
